name: Darling Waste - Good And Bad Angels
description:
Darling Waste's 2011 Studio Album. Recorded over a year in Brighton, England and New York. 

ALL ALBUMS CAN COME SIGNED BY THE BAND FOR NO EXTRA CHARGE.

FOR DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF THE ALBUM PLEASE VISIT 
www.darlingwaste.bandcamp.com

Track List:

1. ( A Theme For) Good and Bad Angels
2. Hannah Bond
3. Inhale/Exhale
4. When The Ball Drops (Or Nua Lang Syne)
5. Please Lie To Me
6. Angels (Took You From Me)
7. Tonight Might Save My Life
8. Those Beautiful Words (Featuring Emily Peal)
9. Samsara
10. Shelf Life
11. A Last Retrospect
12. Angels (Brought You To Me)
13. ( A Requiem For) Good and Bad Angels

name: Darling Waste - Candystripe Brigade T Shirt
description: Darling Waste's most popular shirt, The Candystripe Brigade is back! Sizes from XS-2XL!

name: Darling Waste - Manifest Destiny Rebellion
description:
Darling Waste's self released debut album. Featuring early versions of the songs Learn to Be Happy, I Will Be Fine, Sorry Even Matters, Tour Vans and Neurosis and Blind and Screaming.

Track List:


1. This Is Not A Song
2. Learn To Be Happy
3. Drive Away
4. Changing Of The Seasons
5. I Will Be Fine
6. A List Of Demands
7. Sorry Even Matters
8. Tour Vans and Neurosis
9. Life Is So Rad
10. I Love You...Get Away From Me
11. Blind and Screaming
